name: HealthCheck
description: You can use the AWS::Route53::HealthCheck resource to check the health of your resources before Amazon Route 53 responds to a DNS query. For more information, see How Health Checks Work in Simple Amazon Route 53 Configurations in the Amazon Route 53 Developer Guide.

properties.name: HealthCheckTags
properties.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key–value pairs) for this health check.
